mapper.sql: ID, ClienterID, ForzenAmount, ForzenReason, ForzenDate, ThawReason, ThawDate, Status, Operator, CreateDate
mapper.insert: insert into ClienterForzen (ID, ClienterID, ForzenAmount, ForzenReason, ForzenDate, ThawReason, ThawDate, Status, Operator, CreateDate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clienterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{forzenamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{forzenreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{forzendate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{thawreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{thawdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into ClienterForzen
ID,
ClienterID,
ForzenAmount,
ForzenReason,
ForzenDate,
ThawReason,
ThawDate,
Status,
Operator,
CreateDate,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{clienterid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{forzenamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{forzenreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ClienterForzen
ClienterID = #{clienterid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ForzenAmount = #{forzenamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ForzenReason = #{forzenreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ForzenDate = #{forzendate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ThawReason = #{thawreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ThawDate = #{thawdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Operator = #{operator,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ClienterForzen set ClienterID = #{clienterid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ForzenAmount = #{forzenamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ForzenReason = #{forzenreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ForzenDate = #{forzendate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ThawReason = #{thawreason,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, ThawDate = #{thawdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Operator = #{operator,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: cf.id , c.TrueName AS clienterName , c.PhoneNo AS clienterPhone , cf.ForzenAmount , cf.ForzenDate , ISNULL(cf.ThawDate, '') AS ThawDate , cf.Status , cf.Operator , cf.ForzenReason , ISNULL(cf.ThawReason, '') AS ThawReason

1=1
AND CF.Status=${forzenStatus}
AND cf.ForzenDate>''${startDate}''
AND ''${endDate}''>cf.ForzenDate
AND cf.ThawDate>''${startDate}''
AND ''${endDate}''>cf.ThawDate
AND c.PhoneNo=''${clienterPhone}''
AND c.TrueName LIKE ''%${clienterName}%''
mapper.select: {call Sp_CustomPage2015_V1( ' cf.id DESC ', ' ', ' dbo.ClienterForzen AS cf ( NOLOCK ) JOIN dbo.clienter AS c ( NOLOCK ) ON cf.ClienterID = c.Id ', ' ', #{pageSize,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentPage,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 1, #{totalRecord,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPage,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )}
